data.text: @KeithGibbs5 We would like to inform you that THAI will not be dissolved or go into liquidation or to be declared bankrupt. THAI will be able to conduct its normal business operations including passenger and cargo transportation. (1/2)
@elbfeuereins We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center via email contact@service.thaiairways.com
@changalang42 We do apologize for the inconvenience. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process a large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@elbfeuereins Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@Red_Prince We are truly sorry for the inconvenience.
@NicMacDods We regret to inform you that we are unable to provide you with the clear answer. Please wait for the official announcement.
@Red_Prince We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our related department will proceed with your request as soon as they can.
@arunavatweets We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our officers will proceed with your issue as soon as they can.
@Claudia_Trott We are truly sorry for the inconvenience. Our related department will proceed with this matter as soon as possible.
@arunavatweets We do apologize for the inconvenience.

@RickBar83192380 We suggest that you contact the travel agency for further information.

@Krispmeadows We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our officers will reply to you as soon as possible.

data.text: @hannahfiaa Please wait for the official announcement.

@ShaikhMuzeb Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket. Please check the conditions with the travel agency that you have booked the ticket with.
